title.narrative: Inclusive education for Children with Disabilities - UN Disability

description.narrative: UN-agencies caring for the human rights of persons with disabilities (UNDP Unicef ILO WHO UN-DESA and OHCHR) founded the UN Partnership to Promote the Rights of Persons with Disabilities UNPRDD) in 2011 in the spirit of One-UN. The UNPRPD is now the most effective way to promote the operationalization of the latest UN Human Rights instrument Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in developing countries. Finland is member of the UNPRPD Policy Board. The Fund has created high quality adminis trative and management mechanisms (as part of UNDP structures). The first UNPRPD Financing Round was successfully implemented during 2012. Funding could be provided for 8 countries (340.000usd/country on average) and 8 more countries are on the waiting lis t and ready to mobilize their activities as soon as more donor funding will be raised to the Fund.The UNPRPD has a strong leveraging effect: For each euro the Fund can raise at least another euro from other funding sources.
